website_summaries.verdict: A compact cajon that uses tunable guitar strings to achieve its rich tones.
pros: Handcrafted in a classic/traditional cajon style with good workmanship
Made with four tunable guitar strings
cons: Some claim that this option arrived damaged or defective (marred finish, poor construction)

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value, Great Sound, Nice workmanship
customer_reviews.text: After a lot of reading up on different Cajon's, I decided on the Pyle PCJD18. I've played drums for over 30 years and know good sound when I hear it. This Cajon sounds great! Deep tones along with nice highs. The construction seems to be very good. The rubber feet provide a very stable hold while playing. The overall finish is quite good - better than I expected. In my opinion, it's as good if not better than many other Cajon drums priced higher than this one. While I haven't done so, its weight and size should make it easy to transport.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Appa

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound from this cajon!!
customer_reviews.text: I agonized over reading tons and tons of information trying to pick my first cajon and eventually decided to try the Pyle. Man am I glad I made this choice. It sounds awesome, has great bass and snare sounds and is a nice full size. I only hesitated because for some reason there aren't a lot of videos I found of people using this cajon vs other brands.... I have no idea why after playing it because it is a very nice sounding drum. Thanks Pyle!!
customer_reviews.author: Angie F.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and pretty
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed! I bought this for my boyfriend’s Christmas present, then painted it with logos from his favorite anime shows and a Greek pattern around the edges (he’s from there). I’m really happy with how it looks- it’s also very sturdy. As for the sound, I’ll update this once my boyfriend gets a chance to play it. I did check the Allen key inside and I really like how you can tighten or loosen the wires to dampen the sound.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: They just didn't sound good at all
customer_reviews.text: Bought two different Cajons before this one and returned them both. They just didn't sound good at all. Read all the reviews and noticed it was the second most popular and thought I would give it a try. For the money as well. I couldn't be more happy and it sounded better than the other two. It's also adjustable and has a good sound in the bass and snare. Thanks Pyle for the savings on money and a good sounding Cajon! A five star and well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Long

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality Cajon for a fair price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cajon for my daughter. She spent two summers doing mission work in an orphanage on the outskirts of Lima Peru. So, I thought it would be nice to give her an intrument that originated in Peru. I bought this Pyle Cajon based on good reviews. Overall I am pleased with the sound and build quality. I removed the front playing surface (tapa) to examine the stringed snare mechanism. The tapa was simple to remove and reattach.
customer_reviews.author: Gems By John

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: I didn't give it 5 stars because I've never had a Cajon before. I can't find anything wrong with it. Arrived on time and in perfect condition. Was in a double walled carton, so it was well packed. I used to play all kinds of percussion instruments when younger. I didn't want to have a whole drum set, so I thought I'd try this. It sounds great. Still learning the position of different sound a. It's a lot of fun, easy to play, and I just keep it in the family room. Looks like a short end table. I'm even learning some Latin rhythms.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Came damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful wood. Came with corner crushed. This was clearly a shipping issue. There were two other flaws in the manufacturing however. I don't know if it was made wrong or the damage had something to do with it, but I could not get the cajon to sound like anything other than a cardboard box. A buddy who has 10 years experience came over and we tried all sorts of adjustments. I know the reviews were very good but this must have been a bad one.
customer_reviews.author: James Satkoski

customer_reviews.title: Best buy for Cajon, experienced or not.
customer_reviews.text: This was my first Cajon and it was gifted as a Father's day present and I am very pleased with this product. This item is Great! It was well worth the purchase and highly recommended to anyone with interest in buying their first Cajon or adding to their collection. Great for new or experienced percussionist. Couldn't be more pleased with anything I have ever purchased on Amazon and especially a musical instrument that a person would be skeptical about not being able to hear the sound or testing it out before they bought it. But completely satisfied with it!
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sound!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a beginner so I did lots of research before making this purchase. This particular model stood out to me for many reasons, but mainly due to the overwhelming five star customer reviews on Amazon. Not to mention, the price was great. I've watched lots of tutorials on youtube and upon receiving my Pyle cajon I worked through some practice sets and was amazed at the sound quality and versatility of this cajon! I am super pleased with this purchase and my bandmates were blown away when I used in at rehearsal last night! Thank you Pyle for a fantastic product!
customer_reviews.author: Attiecat

customer_reviews.title: Coming from a drummer!!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that I'm impressed with this box drum. I'm a Native American and since I was a child all Native drums are round. This is so cool to have this drum. The sound is awesome and with a little twist of the little L Key they give you, you can change the sound. I think its very good for the price. And I can get some of the sounds of other drums on this box that I could not get on my large Pow wow drum or hand drum. I am very happy with this purchase and will purchase another one soon. Possibly larger or for one of my children. Happy Drumming!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Eaglefeather

customer_reviews.title: Cheap price but not cheap sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cajon for a church acoustic Christmas song with my family and because it was priced right ($70 range). The reviews said it had good tone and it sounded good in videos. After playing this in front of my church crowd all of the musicians and others thought it had great sound as well as myself. It was easy and enjoyable to sit on top of the instrument and play with my hands. It has a nice finish, seems solid but lightweight and has adjustable snares (two sets of guitar strings). I've been playing percussion for decades and this thing is definitely the best in it's price range and maybe even better than that.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great value! Well made!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value. Well made. Long time drummer...but this is my first cajon. It will be a useful item when playing with small acoustic gigs. I do say that the "snare" effect seems far less than what I've heard on various Youtube videos that I have watched. Perhaps the camera mic is sensitive to that frequency and pumps it up...? I've tried many string adjustments, but its still pretty faint and subtle...its certainly not a snare drum! I weigh 215 and sit on it...no problem. Lightweight construction, yet strong. Great job, Mr. Pyle!
customer_reviews.author: John R. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: A great entry-level cajon
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing but there are a few issues with it that keep me from giving it a higher score. The front panel is a little bit flimsy and feels like it should be a little bit stronger wood. No matter how hard I tried I could not get the snares to stop "snaring". I even tried taping them down and would still get the snare effect, even when I hit the bass in the center. But for the price, and if you don't mind that snare drum sound, this thing is really great.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Manso

customer_reviews.title: Fun. Easy. High quality.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is way cool. It’s made plenty well (an adult has to sit on it on it better be). It’s so fun and easy to play that almost anyone plays it and has a great time. I’be even had experienced drummers come over that found it to be crazy amounts of fun and were impressed by it. The instrument has a cool history so it’s also a good conversation piece. It’s also a piece of furniture so it’s got that going for it too.
customer_reviews.author: Milad Bakhtiari

customer_reviews.title: Fun to learn, even for those who aren't A+ musicians
customer_reviews.text: I've seen Cajons used in a few church services, and I decided that I'd like to give one a try. After reading several reviews I decided on the Pyle PCJD18. After watching a few beginner videos I am having a blast keeping the beat with some of my favorite music. This Cajon sounds great, arrived in excellent condition, and feels like it'll have no problem handling my 235-lb weight.
customer_reviews.author: Rock Roberge

customer_reviews.title: Cajon lives up to its rep
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cajon after reading the reviews of “the 15 best cajons for 2019” on a music website and then comparing the Amazon reviews of my top two choices. This was a great choice for my son— a pretty accomplished percussionist, a beginning pianist, and a first-time cajon player! He is happy with the sound quality and did not need to make any adjustments “out of the box.” He suggested that I give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: MMcK

customer_reviews.title: A Steamy Pyle of Goodness!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite purchase in some time. I have wanted a cajon for forever but never understood the high prices for such simple construction. This Pyle of cajon was packaged minimally but safely and arrived with no problem. It has a great snare sound and excellent bass. If this is what a $77 cajon sounds like, I am very curious as to what a $200+ cajon sounds like.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Nice snare bite in the sound
customer_reviews.text: This Cajon is everything I was hoping for in my first Cajon. The sound has a sharp snare tone and can be easily modified for a tom sound by placing your foot against the front plate. If you mike it, it sounds just like a kit. I have found that the bass can be modified by the amount of velocity and the placement of the hit which I really like. It also has a really clean snare sound along with a rim shot sound that works well for quick 16th notes. I'm really looking forward to getting to know this instrument. I couldn't be happier with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and great sounding
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this instrument for home jamming as well as use in the church praise band. I'm really happy with the nice solid bass I can produce with this, along with the sharp sounding snare. I've not played any other brands to compare this to, but I'm very happy with this one. I'd also like to add that the quality of the wood and finish look great as well. To me, aesthetics is just as important as a sound quality, especially when it's going to be used up on stage.
customer_reviews.author: TechDad14

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this Cajon is a good value. After playing with it a bit and working to get the strings to the right tightness (plus some practice), we're pretty happy with it. Not sure the sound quality will match a more expensive version, but then again I've never had a more expensive version. The strings can be a little bit rattle-y - takes time to figure out how to avoid that sound.
customer_reviews.author: James B

customer_reviews.title: Light but Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting to learn the drums for quite some time but don't have the space for a full set in the house. I saw a kid playing this at an event and it was easy to pack up and haul in a vehicle. It's something I can use sitting in the living room playing and playing along with videos. I bought it so I can use it at church since we currently don't have a drummer. The sound is GREAT! The construction is solid and I like that it came with it's Allen wrench for adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Filigree Ann

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound and construction
customer_reviews.text: Fun in a box. My wife wanted one of these, so we decided on a trusted name. We don't read music but we love it. We are both poets and we use the drum to accent our readings. We get volunteers from the crowd and they play background to ours and others poems. Looks like it will withstand most conditions. It is well made and when you see it played you'll say I can do that!
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Gullickson

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have had this Cajon for a couple weeks now and can only say good things about it. Arrived on time & was well packaged.....right out of the box this thing sounded great..........great low end.....nice snare sound which doesn't over power when hitting the low end sound.......and a nice clap sound towards the top.....the forward facing bass ports really project the sound....still feeling her out.......but this is a very nice sounding & solid construction Cajon that will work great in any live acoustic type indoor or outdoor gig setting......I would recommend this Cajon to anyone wanting a great sounding gig quality sound.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Williams

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sound quality and solidly built..
customer_reviews.text: I been playing accustic drums for 40 years and I thought I would give the Cajon a try.. Man I couldn't be more pleased I did.. The Pyle Jam is an excellent product. . The sound is amazing. It is tuned so nice I did not even do anything to it but adjust the snare strings a little. . The PylePro has amazing bass capability by where and how you place you hand.. I truly recommend this Cajon over all the others I tried. Sound and Price is unmatched by any of the others...
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Foster

customer_reviews.title: Great USA made product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed cajon with adjustable snares on both sides and adjustable/removable strike panel. Nice deep bass in the sweet spot and complete control of the snare range. Got the matching Pyle travel bag which is well constructed, as well. Good price for the entire deal.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great Value/Quality for the Money
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always wanted one of these and I’m glad I bought this Pyle. This is a great all around Cajon, not just for beginners, but every skill level. I especially like the easy tunability of the strings to get the right “snare” sound. Its price point is amazing for the sound and quality you get. Look no further, this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: RANDY J.

customer_reviews.title: I've wanted to own a cajon for years and I'm so glad I finally bought one
customer_reviews.text: This cajon is nothing fancy, but totally satisfying. It has great variation in the amount of snare sound you get based on where on the face you hit it. I prefer relatively minimal snare, so I left the tape on on the inside. I might try at some point to tape it in such a way that one side is more snary than the other, but my experience was that when I took off the tape on one side the whole thing got more snary.
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm Ocean

customer_reviews.title: Love my new cajon
customer_reviews.text: I am very excited about my new cajon. I have looked at other more expensive ones, and quite frankly, I do not hear a difference. This Pyle cajon sounds great. I like the simple wood grain. It is the perfect size and can be tuned. beautiful music from the snare to the bass. I am glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Klozoff

customer_reviews.title: Bought this as a gift...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Pyle Cajon Percussion Box for one of my students. He has been asking for a cajon for several years now. He plays the drums in church for our Praise and Worship Band. He is very excited to get this model and is very happy for the quality and variations of tones in this instrument. We highly recommend a Pyle Cajon for anyone seeking a good quality instrument.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanna Dove

customer_reviews.title: A good Cajon drum for the price
customer_reviews.text: I got this product as a father's day gift. The product has a nice size and is easy to sit on. The product has a good range for snare to bass. I even use the top sides for some elevated tones. I wish the product was a one more inch tall to add more room for bass as I feel restricted for space for Bass. It has a good feature to tune the tension of the guitar strings. I recommend this product for all beginners. This offers good sound quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sashi Babs

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Instrument
customer_reviews.text: This Cajon is remarkable. After much research the PCJD18 was on virtually every list for best Cajons. I immediately loved the sound and construction of this instrument. A few minor adjustments to tailor the snare sound and tapa tension and it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: MrSteveP

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my daughter. She loves it. Does everything she hoped for, and she is learning to play it. No pun intended but it was a "hit" in her school music class as well. Build quality seems very sturdy. No issues...
customer_reviews.author: Recluse

customer_reviews.title: Nice tone, Easy to tune, Pleasure to Play
customer_reviews.text: First know, I paid for my Cajon out of my own pocket. This is my first Cajon. What attracted me most to the Pyle PCJD18 is the tone of the snare, it sounds exactly as I need to blend with my drum kit or for solo percussion. The day it arrived, I did a quick recording and it blended perfectly. I had no idea how versatile this instrument is. All home studios should have one. Also, I love the tuning detail one can achieve with this instrument.
customer_reviews.author: Oppo

customer_reviews.title: Love this! I’m in a small ukulele group that ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I’m in a small ukulele group that is booming with upcoming gigs and I provide the percussion for the group. I’ve been using a small set of bongos but this is going to rock their world. I love that each side makes a different sound. Also, now I don’t have to carry a chair when we go places! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: YHoskins

customer_reviews.title: Very affordable, nice sound!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first cajon and I read many reviews before purchasing. It seems like very nice quality for an affordable price. I'm just learning how to achieve the sound I like, but so far it sounds great. Definitely a fun instrument to have around!
customer_reviews.author: Mike R.

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a solid instrument for the money
customer_reviews.text: I got one from the prime warehouse with a condition marked, "very good." It didn't have any severe blemishes but had a noticeable scratch in the wood. The sound seems pleasant, although I don't have enough of a background to provide an analysis. It is well constructed and I like the fact that the guitar strings are full length verses some of the other models. Not sure if that actually effects sound but I would guess it does. overall, we are happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Silentlight

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't sound good
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you test some Cajon's before purchasing. The sound of beating the backside of a guitar or ukulele is a much better sound that this.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a kit drummer, this is my first cajon. Didn't want to spend a ton of money on something I wasn't sure if it was going to work for me. Read the reviews and based on other peoples feedback, selected this model. Followed instructions on how to initially tune, getting great sounds out of this thing! Can't wait to use around the campfire with some of my band mates.
customer_reviews.author: Richard P.

customer_reviews.title: Value AND versatility!
customer_reviews.text: This was great purchase. My wife and her friends belt tunes and jam, and I hold a backbeat. Paired with a tamborine or a shaker, it’s perfect for what we do! Definite has adjustability and I found the sound I like after a few rounds and adjustments. I was cautious because of the price, but the reviews online and on forums were what sold me on this Cajon.
customer_reviews.author: thumbelita

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Very well built instrument. The sound is great. The item arrived in excellent condition and was very well packaged. I primarily bought this for my teenage daughters to have fun with but I think I'll enjoy it as much as them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Piece of Equipment and Easy to Play
customer_reviews.text: I finally got all the kids out of the house and decided it was time to have some fun! I saw a guy playing one of these in church and it sounded cool and looked like something I could figure out without having to take lessons or anything. So I ordered one and I am super happy with it and having fun. It seems of very good quality, nice looking and sounds great. Easy to adjust the sound if desired.
customer_reviews.author: Terri D in San Diego

customer_reviews.title: Good quality cajon and a good value!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived packaged well and fits the description exactly as provided on the Amazon site. The sound quality of the cajon, from my experience is good when compared with other, similar offerings--even those that are higher priced. It may not be a professional grade, touring or recording first choice, but perfect for general application and mics up well. I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Juls from NJ

customer_reviews.title: Overall the sound quality is very good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas present for our family. Overall the sound quality is very good for the price. There was one minor defect in that there was a slight gap (just tiny enough to fit a paper clip through and about 3/4 inch long) between the wood on the face of the instrument and the top. Rather than return it I will just put a little wood glue on it and clamp it. It doesn't affect the sound quality so I'm not concerned too much.
customer_reviews.author: JVNL

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I have a new home with a music room with a piano, guitar, bongo, and some small percussion toys, but the room lacked a drum with some body. This Cajon has a very rich and warm sound and was ready to use right out of the box. It is perfect for the amateur or the seasoned professional This was the perfect addition to fill the room with great sound and complete the musical ensemble. Now when friends come over to hang and play, it sounds like a full band in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Imtomcat

customer_reviews.title: Great beat for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this for me as an early Christmas/ late birthday present after I hinted around that I wanted a cajon drum... since the price was very reasonable I didn’t expect much - but this thing is great. I’m not small and this drum is the perfect height for me, feels solid ( look at those joints!) and has great tone! Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: H2

customer_reviews.title: Nice little drum!
customer_reviews.text: Little to report on so far, just got it. Came packaged very well and in good condition with no shipping damage. Very attractive instrument, beautiful wood and no visible manufacturing damage like burred screw heads, tool marks on the wood (scratches). If I never become a proficient Cajon Drummer it’s going to be a beautiful addition to my music room.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Swift

customer_reviews.title: Bad Craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: Out of box, first thing I noticed was rough & scratchy edges, where it almost gave me splinters at certain spots. The materials felt like cheap wood that I didn’t feel comfortable sitting on it. Sounds it produced were okay though as mentioned in other reviews, it can’t quite give a dynamic range of sounds. Not sure how this item is flooded with good reviews on Amazon as well as on the internet. Perhaps it was just bad luck for me but I’m returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Lam

customer_reviews.title: Rhythm for a ukulele/guitar owner
customer_reviews.text: This is my first cajon. Thought I would add this instrument to my list of string instruments; folks would drop by and we would jam - however knocking on a ukulele body never satisfied me. This cajon has a solid, deep sounding bass, and its snares sound great to me. I think this is a great instrument for the beginner cajonist!
customer_reviews.author: Gerald A Fontejon

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Front face chipped up and not as solid as other brands I have used before. Thin front piece and sounds tiny. Not happy with the quality of this drum.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Rossignol

customer_reviews.title: Handling sucks
customer_reviews.text: Rusty screws. Sounds decent for what it is. Handling was a MESS. Looks like they played soccer with the box 📦. Box says wht the item is and they don’t have the delicacy to handle it properly, I returned it and they punched the box the second time, luckily the hit didn’t went thru the wood of the cajon, but you can still see damage.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, High Quality Cajon
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an affordable cajon for use in the young adult ministry I run. After reading the positive reviews of this Pyle one, I decided to give it a try. The cajon seems well constructed and the sound quality from it is very much like more expensive cajons I’ve heard. (This all reminds me of how Pyle products are in general — cheaper and yet not cheaply made.)
customer_reviews.author: Timothy R. Butler

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use in our music room, adults are just as interested as the kids. Have a tablet set up with a cajon tutorial and hear the druming when ever we have guests.
customer_reviews.author: Patsy R

customer_reviews.title: Good value Cajon
customer_reviews.text: I like the 11.5"x11.75"x19" size for me it is easier to sit on with larger front playing surface. I like the deep bass tone. The slap tones are good- might need to play with the snare wire adjustments some more as there is some uncertainty in that respect. The Pyle Pro is the one I prefer playing over the Meinl Woodcraft (although the Meinl has a fixed snare I like which requires no adjusting and sounds good too) I like the bass sound and the size of the Pyle Pro better for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for our church choir
customer_reviews.text: Mu husband loves his box, he's delighted. Great tool for our church choir it does make a big difference
customer_reviews.author: MaRamos

customer_reviews.title: Happy I brought this.  Great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first purchase of a Cajon. I'm very happy with this. It is light weight. The sound is very good. The snare easy to adjust. Bass sound is deep and clear. In addition, it is very attractive. It is like a nice piece of furniture in my house.
customer_reviews.author: W. jeong

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! I am an amateur on percussion but this seems like everything I've expected in a Cajon. From what I've seen & heard beforehand,I've been more than satisfied with it's sound,since it arrived. Especially after researching for a couple months! Also,very happy with the speedy delivery & product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Mansfield

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Cajon
customer_reviews.text: I bought a different brand cajon that was more expensive and didn't like it very well. I sold that one and bought this one, and it is amazing. The bass is perfect and the treble is spot on as well. I really enjoy playing this and would recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: James O. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: The wood finish with the Pyle logo on the front is beautiful. The adjustable snare works great
customer_reviews.text: This product is very well made. The built quality is what you would expect from a more expensive wooden cajon. The wood finish with the Pyle logo on the front is beautiful. The adjustable snare works great, by dialing in just the right amount of desired snare with a bundled allen-key. The bass tone is as deep as my old cajon, which I paid over $300 dollars for.I like the very visible black screws in the front which gives it a very sturdy look. The black screws in the front implies that it is removable/replaceable, should it ever get damaged. Great/Beautiful cajon for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice drum box
customer_reviews.text: This puts out a nice sound. However the front panel of my box has a distinct line on the wood that worries me. I feel if I hit too hard it may crack on that seem.
customer_reviews.author: PWSWORLD

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing sound
customer_reviews.text: The product came in perfect, Just doesn’t have the quality sound that I was looking for. After watching tons of videos of these I found this ones sound to be disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: MeatDragon

customer_reviews.title: Cajon Cagood!
customer_reviews.text: Solid Built Cajon. Did the bottom screw loosening and it sounds pretty good. My first so I only have online videos to compare but sounds good. Great for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Jones

customer_reviews.title: Quality built, Sounds great.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, well packaged and sounds great. Comfortable size for adults and my nine year old can sit comfortably and play as well. He takes drum lessons and the cajon is great to keep him interested and engaged. Lightweight, easy to transport and a piece of cake to grab for an impromptu jam session. Quality built, sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: momof3

customer_reviews.title: Great cajon! Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier! I've been shopping for a cajon for several years, but I couldn't spend a fortune on one. I also didn't want a cheap one that would only disappoint me. I watched a video on YouTube about the 5 best cajons, and I chose yours. I like that it's taller than the others. I love the sound! I plan to play it at church more than anywhere else, and I can hardly wait for Sunday!!
customer_reviews.author: Paul R.

customer_reviews.title: Best item for the dollar!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this item for our son for a "first instrument". I did a little outside research at a couple stores and discovered this was the best item for the dollar. Not only that, but it has adjustable snare cords that can change in tension which changes the tone of the drum. Others I looked at were not adjustable and had a cheaper interior snare. We loved it as much when he played it for the first time on Christmas day!
customer_reviews.author: Steve G.

customer_reviews.title: decent classroom instrument
customer_reviews.text: For an inexpensive cajon, it’s pretty good. I was hoping for a deeper bass tone, and there’s a little too much snare which makes it sound a bit tinny. The front panel also feels a little flimsy, like if I hit it too hard it’ll break. I’m using it as a classroom instrument, so it’ll be fine for that purpose and my elementary students will love it, but I probably wouldn’t recommend this for professional use.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Gee

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the family for Christmas. My hubby has been looking all over for one. He was VERY surprised! Perfect for when friends come over to play music and it doubles as an extra seat! LOL not sure about the rattle of the strings yet...he may tape the strings back down. But everyone who has played it, loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Candice McDowell

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my acoustic instrument collection
customer_reviews.text: This box drum was a great addition to my acoustic instrument collection. It has a very deep rich sound great for a small room or a large space. Would definitely recommend this to any musician looking to enhance their instrument collection.
customer_reviews.author: Hector

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality & Sound
customer_reviews.text: This Pyle Cajon arrived quickly and in perfect condition. It is very light weight, but extremely well constructed and sturdy. It is very comfortable to sit on, and it has such amazing sounds. You can easily get a deep bass without stooping or leaning. This Pyle Cajon is a high quality instrument for the price, and I would certainly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great cajon.
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Quality instrument at an affordable price. Zero issues with the quality of the product. Received cajon with box and instrument in great shape. Plays nicely. Still trying to tweak sound - apparently this takes time as you become more proficient. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great instrument at a great value!
customer_reviews.text: Our 18 year old son is a fantastic drummer, and is heading off to college to NC State. Since he can't take his drum set right away, we wanted him to have a cajon that he could play anytime/anywhere. We were very pleased with the instrument - durability, sound quality and the stringed feature (new to us)! His dorm will be rocking this year!
customer_reviews.author: B Hankinson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my first cajon
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a quality (and not too expensive) cajon to purchase so I could start learning how to play. This one was not only highly rated but had very comprehensive and informative information on the product page. I had a pretty good idea of what I'd be getting and placed the order. I was not disappointed - this is just what I wanted. The case is beautiful and solidly built, with smoothly sanded edges. It was carefully boxed to ensure no damage during shipping and sounded great right out of the box. Very pleased with this cajon - now to learn how to play!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Breitenstein

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: We're got this for our child who had ad/HD and it sounds great too. Great bass response and different tonal properties. I have used it on several tracks as the main percussive instrument. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Felicity

customer_reviews.title: It's OK but not amazing.
customer_reviews.text: It's decent and looks nice for the price. Nothing to write home about. Hardly any bass and limited sound variance across the surface area of striking part. I wish I would've invested in a slightly better and different model.
customer_reviews.author: Sarwang Parikh

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I bought the pcjd18 when our church started doing acoustic video worship because of the Covid shutdowns. I really like the size, weight and overall tonality. The only reason I knocked 1 star off is sound of the “snare” is not as distinct as I had hoped. I will say that when you mic it up through a good sound system with a bit of reverb makes a dramatic difference. Overall for the price I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For
customer_reviews.text: At first, I was somewhat in favor of this Pyle cajon, then when we played it along with the Pearl cajon we previously purchased it was no comparison. The Pearl was far and away better! The Pyle has almost no bass tones, no matter how I adjusted it, snares are not great either. Pearl has a deep bass tone area, and many more sound levels can be achieved. I had to return the Pyle for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Webb

customer_reviews.title: 5 star ratings are deceptive. Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in the sound of the unit. It was not deep enough. Sounded really thin. This is a low end cajon that I do not recommend for anyone thinking of jamming out with friends or on stage.
customer_reviews.author: Mr&MrsV

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted to get a Cajon for a while now so I read the reviews and I am not disappointed at all. Love the sound and that it is light weight. I play on fridays nights in a jam sessions and this is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Janie Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great service, good cajon
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 24 yo. It's a great size and works/sounds like we expect a cajon to. The first one we received had a flaw in the finish. They replaced it without any hassle. I'd purchase this one for my daughter as she keeps adding to her instrument collection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: So far I am very happy with this cajon! I am still learning how to use the strings for the snare effect, I'm sure it's not that difficult however I just haven't had the time. The sound quality is pretty good for the price and I am very happy with the way it looks. My experience seems to be consistent with other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie J. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Decent product! Arrived in great shape, and it sounds great. It's sad to hear that other reviews have had negative experiences, and I hope they got their items fixed and returned. Overall, this is worth purchasing, and I'm sure it will last a long time. Quality stuff and great sound (deep bass and bright snare)!
customer_reviews.author: Justin cheng

customer_reviews.title: Five stars!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my new Pyle String Cajon, from the excellent craftsmanship to the quick delivery time! Sounds great! For the money, you won't find a better deal!
customer_reviews.author: Howard J. Brown

customer_reviews.title: I am glad I chose this one!
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely happy with this cajon. I researched a good bit before purchasing and I am very glad I chose this one!
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Clement

customer_reviews.title: but the sound is good. The wood seems a little thin
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, packaged well. I'm not experienced with these so I wouldn't know how to compare to others, but the sound is good. The wood seems a little thin. I'd say it's great for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great cajon for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first cajon. Sound is good, fit and finish is great. It's not fancy but it is very solid. Begs for personalization. Price was definitly part of my choice, i was nervous but now I'm glad I chose this one. I am knocking one star because you have to do a review to get the carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: howard mcelhinny

customer_reviews.title: Very good value
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be pretty solidly built. I have good success with trusting the ratings on Amazon. This seems to hold true for this item as well. Seems well built and sounds good for the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Cool!
customer_reviews.text: I am not a drummer. I bought this item for an autistic child who is exploring making and mixing sounds to replicate what he can make on the various settings on an electronic keyboard. You can make a lovely range of sounds with this one item. The whole family is having fun exploring the drum. Easy to find videos on Youtube to get started. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Auntie

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun, Great Sound!
customer_reviews.text: Getting a full set of drums has not been feasible in our home, but I missed the dynamic feeling of playing. I got this cajon as a birthday gift and I absolutely LOVE it! It is sturdy and the sound is great. There are so many possible sounds and ways to play. I am having so much fun. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Biking Dad

customer_reviews.title: It is all wood, so if it is ascetics you are looking for, this is a natural selection.
customer_reviews.text: It is an extra seat, it is a TV tray, it is a beautiful musical instrument to decorate you living room, it is a drum to get more people involved in making music, and it is a great way to get your groove on.
customer_reviews.author: Spuck Daviau

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love the sound this gives off. Material is sturdy and build quality is good. It's not the most high end cajon, but worth it for beginners or people who want something around for jam sessions.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Pyle cajon
customer_reviews.text: This is my second cajon, great price. Love the wide sound and good base line, the snare is what I was looking for crispy I ben playing hand drumming most of my life going forom a travel cajon to full zise makes a big deference I will buy again. I wished it was darker wood color, other then that is good adddition to my percussion instrumens.
customer_reviews.author: eagleman

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Product
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed it came damaged. Christmas present to my husband. I was so excited to see his face. He loves iy, however, I would've liked to have given him a non damaged item.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie O'Neil

customer_reviews.title: Great Cajon!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with my purchase of the Pyle string cajon. (I had purchased another brand, then I returned it. The sound quality was not very good.) This cajon sound is awesome! Although I am a beginner, I look forward to learning how to play this cajon properly. So far, I’m having fun with it. My family is also enjoying it! It is well made. The wood grain is gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: skpoindexter

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound. Fit and Finish Could be Improved
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great. It's my first Cajone so I'm not too particularly familiar with them. I would have given it 5 stars however the fit and finish could have been better. It looks like some urethane might have drippied on the front in a couple of spots. Adittionally there is a small gap on the top seem. See photos. These are pretty minor details, that not everyone would notice and I'm certain these issues wouldn't affect the sound or performance. Just tiny details I usually notice.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan V.

customer_reviews.title: We can't believe how good it sounds and how many sounds it makes
customer_reviews.text: We just gave this to our musical child for a gift. He loves it. We can't believe how good it sounds and how many sounds it makes. It sounds like a whole drum kit. It is very high quality. Great purchase! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For the price, it is good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: It does not have the heavy deep bass I was looking for. The front face felt thin. The sound was a little flat.
customer_reviews.author: Ferdinand Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought for son that was into percussion for Christmas. Wanted good quality. Was impressed by sound and feel. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ron Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Came with a 1 inch dent on the front and a small raised place on the front that looks like the plywood started to separate. Seems to play alright though. I didn't expect perfection for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Downs

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I think a terrific product. I was impressed by quality of the drum. It is smooth, sounds good and my son loves his new drum.
customer_reviews.author: Joel McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not as good as the reviews, but it’s an “ok” cheap cajon.
customer_reviews.author: L LEVERETT

customer_reviews.title: Quality of the sound
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sound, beautiful finish! My husband was thrilled with the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Pyle String Cajon - Wooden Percussion Box, with Internal Guitar Strings, Full Size
product_meta.description: Pyle Model : PCJD18Wooden Cajon Percussion Box Stringed Jam Cajon - Wooden Cajon Percussion Box Features: Classic/Traditional Cajon Style Hand-Crafted Wooden Panel Box Frame Acoustical ‘Hand-Percussion’ Tone Sounds Internal Guitar Strings for Rhythmic Production Rubber-Capped Feet for Anti-Vibration Interference Lightweight & Compact Design Musical Fun for All Ages! Technical Specs: Wood Panel Construction Material: Birch Wood Total Size (L x W x H): 12. 0’’ x 12. 0’’ x 18. 0’’The Pyle Stringed Jam Cajon features classic and traditional instrument style. Hand-crafted wooden panel box frame ensures efficient acoustical percussion sounds, and style. Integrated guitar strings allow for rhythmic production while the rubber-capped feet at the base provide anti-vibration interference. Lightweight and compact design makes it perfect for beginners and professionals -- of all ages! Get an introduction, to musical percussion, with the Pyle Stringed Jam Cajon.
feature_bullets: PERFECT HANDCRAFT : Introducing Pyle string Jam Cajon, a perfect musical instrument that brings more life into your music An amazing hand crafted wooden panel box frame built in classic /traditional instrument style

ADJUSTABLE GUITAR STRINGS : Pyle string Jam Cajon is exquisitely engineered to allow musicians to totally express themselves, it features internal Adjustable guitar strings which provides a smooth rhythmic sound production for a better musical experience Strings can be tuned from the bottom of the cajon (hex key included inside)

COMPACT AND LIGHTWEIGHT : Comes in a compact size (LxWxH) : 12.0" x12.0" x18.0" and weighs only 10.9 pounds Very light and easy to carry about unlike other heavy and bulky brands of stringed Jam Cajon

ANTI-VIBRATION INTERFERENCE : Pyle wooden Cajon percussion box features a rubber- capped feet in order to prevent any possibility of vibration interference and encourage original crystal clear acoustic sound productio
BUY WITH PEACE OF MIND : Pyle cajon is backed by 1 year warranty We urge you to purchase with an absolute confidence that your satisfaction is guaranteed

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars913 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
